testsuite.name: Scenario: Create a new assignment and check equation editors of assignment editor details page and open correctly

testcase.name: Given I am logged in as the default administrator
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new assignment and check equation editors of assignment editor details page and open correctly

testcase.name: And I am on the Content Repository page of Demonstration Class
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new assignment and check equation editors of assignment editor details page and open correctly

testcase.name: When I choose creating new assignment in "Student Readiness" unit from the main dropdown button
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new assignment and check equation editors of assignment editor details page and open correctly

testcase.name: Then Assignment Editor is opened
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new assignment and check equation editors of assignment editor details page and open correctly

testcase.name: When I click "Text to show at the head of each page" section
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new assignment and check equation editors of assignment editor details page and open correctly

testcase.name: And I assert that the Header CKEditor is visible
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new assignment and check equation editors of assignment editor details page and open correctly

testcase.name: And I click the Equation Editor button of the Header CKEditor
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new assignment and check equation editors of assignment editor details page and open correctly

testcase.name: And I assert that the Math Editor dialog is visible
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new assignment and check equation editors of assignment editor details page and open correctly

testcase.name: And I click Cancel in the Math Editor dialog
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new assignment and check equation editors of assignment editor details page and open correctly

testcase.name: When I click "Text to show on the results page" section
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new assignment and check equation editors of assignment editor details page and open correctly

testcase.name: And I assert that the Results CKEditor is visible
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new assignment and check equation editors of assignment editor details page and open correctly

testcase.name: And I click the Equation Editor button of the Results CKEditor
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new assignment and check equation editors of assignment editor details page and open correctly

testcase.name: And I assert that the Math Editor dialog is visible
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new assignment and check equation editors of assignment editor details page and open correctly

testcase.name: And I click Cancel in the Math Editor dialog
testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new assignment and check equation editors of assignment editor details page and open correctly

testcase.classname: Scenario: Create a new assignment and check equation editors of assignment editor details page and open correctly

testsuite.system-out: Scenario: Create a new question and test opening equation editor dialog in the response specific feedback area for MC questions ?[90m# MathEditorDialog.feature:70?[0m ?[32mWhen ?[0m?[32mI choose creating new question/Text from the main dropdown button?[0m ?[90m# ContentRepositorySteps.chooseCreatingNewQuestionFromMainDropdownButton()?[0m ?[32mAnd ?[0m?[32mQuestion Designer is opened?[0m ?[90m# QuestionDesignerSteps.assertQuestionDesignerPageIsOpened()?[0m ?[32mAnd ?[0m?[32mI click inside the question text editor?[0m ?[90m# QuestionDesignerSteps.clickInsideQuestionTextEditor()?[0m ?[32mAnd ?[0m?[32mI click Response Area button to open the dialog and assert that the Choose Question Type page is visible?[0m ?[90m# QuestionDesignerSteps.clickInsertResponseAreaButton()?[0m ?[32mWhen ?[0m?[32mI choose "?[0m?[32m?[1mMultiple Choice?[0m?[32m" link from the dialog and complete the correct answer?[0m ?[90m# QuestionDesignerSteps.chooseTypeAndCompleteCorrectAnswer(String)?[0m ?[32mAnd ?[0m?[32mI click the Math Editor button in the second response specific feedback editor?[0m ?[90m# QuestionDesignerSteps.clickMultipleChoiceResponseSpecificFeedbackMathEditor()?[0m ?[32mThen ?[0m?[32mI assert that the Math Editor dialog is visible?[0m ?[90m# MathEditorDialogSteps.assertMathEditorDialogVisible()?[0m ?[32mAnd ?[0m?[32mI click Cancel in the Math Editor dialog?[0m ?[90m# MathEditorDialogSteps.cancelDialog()?[0m
